abstract: Iranian supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei comments for first time following nuclear agreement with his country, saying deal requires 'careful scrutiny'; statement seems to open space for hard-liners to criticize deal.
lead_paragraph: The Ayatollah seemed to provide an opening for criticism of the deal by saying that some participants in the negotiations were not trustworthy.

headline.main: Supreme Leader Ali Khamenei Urges ‘Careful Scrutiny’ of Iran Deal
headline.print_headline: Supreme Leader Urges ‘Careful Scrutiny’ of Deal

snippet: The Ayatollah seemed to provide an opening for criticism of the deal by saying that some participants in the negotiations were not trustworthy.
